body.p: In developing the proposals in the 2010 ED, the Board noted that entities must comply with the general materiality requirements in paragraphs 17(c) and 31 of IAS 1, including the requirement to disclose additional information if necessary, and that the financial statements need not contain disclosures that are not material.
